headline.main: PRO-NAZI EDITOR IS SLAIN IN PARIS; Albert Clement Was Head of Jacques Doriot's Paper -- Assassin Escapes PRO-NAZI EDITOR IS SLAIN IN PARIS

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Wednesday, June 3 -- Albert Clement, managing editor of Jacques Doriot's newspaper, Le Cri du Peuple of Paris, was killed by three revolver bullets as he was leaving his office on the Rue Vivienne at ten minutes to 8 o'clock last evening.
abstract: A Clement, ed of J Doriot's Paris Le Cri du Peuple, killed; assassin escapes; Communist round-up reptd
